addAgent(address).details: Adds an agent role to the specified address. Can only be called by the contract owner.

params._agent: The address to be assigned as an agent. Requirements: - `_agent` must not be the zero address.

addTA(address).details: Adds a transfer agent (TA) role to the specified address. Can only be called by the contract owner.

params._agent: The address to be assigned as a TA. Requirements: - `_agent` must not be the zero address.

isAgent(address).details: Checks if an address has the agent role.

returns._0: `true` if the address is an agent, `false` otherwise.

isTA(address).details: Checks if an address has the transfer agent (TA) role.

returns._0: `true` if the address is a TA, `false` otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeAgent(address).details: Removes an agent role from the specified address. Can only be called by the contract owner.

params._agent: The address to be removed from the agent role. Requirements: - `_agent` must not be the zero address.

removeTA(address).details: Removes a transfer agent (TA) role from the specified address. Can only be called by the contract owner.

params._agent: The address to be removed from the TA role. Requirements: - `_agent` must not be the zero address.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
